CaseProceedingComplaint.name: CaseProceedingComplaint
CaseProceedingComplaint.description: Represents the association between a complaint and its corresponding case proceeding.

CaseProceedingId.description: The case proceeding associated with the case proceeding complaint record.

ComplaintId.description: The complaint associated with the case proceeding record.

LastReferencedDate.description: The timestamp when the current user last accessed this record indirectly, for example, through a list view or related record

LastViewedDate.description: The timestamp when the current user last viewed this record or list view.

Name.description: The name of the case proceeding complaint record.
